actions.committee: Committee on the Budget pursuant to Section 258(a)(3) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, for not to exceed five days of session
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget pursuant to Section 258(a)(3) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, for not to exceed five days of session.

actions.in_committee: Committee on the Budget pursuant to Section 258(a)(3) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, for not to exceed five days of session
actions.text: Committee on the Budget. Ordered to be reported without amendment unfavorably.
Committee on the Budget. Reported by Senator Conrad unfavorably without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 315.
Failed of passage in Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A joint resolution suspending certain provisions of law pursuant to section 258(a)(2) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.

titles.title: A joint resolution suspending certain provisions of law pursuant to section 258(a)(2) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
